Take control of your Kodi™ media center. Play, pause, and stop playback. Skip forward or back. Control the volume. List and launch playlists or addons, even when your TV remote is out of reach, and your TV is out of sight. 
Battery-friendly: shake your Pebble to update the display.

data.description: A traditional Calculator on a Smartwatch can be cumbersome due to the limited number of input options available. Tilt Calc solves this problem by allowing you to perform calculations with the tilt of your wrist. Simply tilt the watch in any direction to move the cursor. Make a selection with any button on the right side of the Pebble Smartwatch.

data.description:
A zombie apocalypse can be hard work. Even zombies need a break sometime. They decided to pack up their belongings (mostly brains), and head for sunny Hawaii for a vacation. The only problem is….so did you!

Run for your life as the angry zombie masses try to make you pay for wrecking their vacation! Use everything in your path to escape; after all, not all zombies are slow!

If you enjoy the app donate at www.atraydev.com/donate!
data.title: ZombieHop

changelog.release_notes:
v0.7 - Built for SDK v4

* Now targets Diorite platform for Pebble 2 support.
* Fixes app's menu icon for SDK v4
* Updates app display name

v0.6 - Improves device support

* Pebble Round (chalk) support
* Pebble / Pebble time (aplite) SDK v3 support
v0.5 with improved display, round timer and help text

v0.4 comes with official Pebble Time support!

* coloured display (blue/red for corp/runner turns)
* improved action bar on Pebble Time
* tweaked layout of clicks so it displays more consistently across devices

Improved design!

Now includes an action bar to describe button behaviours.

v0.2 is the first version published to the Pebble appstore!

It fixes a few minor issues with memory management in v0.1 and corrects the app's display name.

data.description:
A simple hue app: recall scenes, switch hue lights on/off, select favorites and recall them. 

With version 0.8 I added a favorite scenes menu. You can add favorite scenes by "longpressing" the select button in the "select scene" menu. To delete a scene from the "favorites" menu "longpress" the select button. 

I'm going to add color to the app soon. If you want to help me with a little donation you can fund me and help me to get an Pebble Time: http://www.gofundme.com/y4mkrew 

This Watchapp is NOT made by Philips!

data.description: Unofficial Pebble app for MOL Bubi, the Budapest public bike-sharing system. It lists the docking stations, closest first, showing the distance, number of available bikes and the total number of racks for each. By selecting a station (using the select button), the approximate distance and direction are displayed, conveniently guiding you to the station. Works in Budapest, Hungary only.

changelog.release_notes: Thank you robbet hesse for the help

data.description:
Hello and welcome to rotate. This app is for any magicians who want to perform the self winding nut and bolt.

Quick instructions: Load the app which looks like a standard watch face. When you are ready to perform simply press the top button once and you will feel a short vibration to let you know its ready. 

4 seconds late the magic will happen. This will last for 10 seconds then stop. This should be more than enough time to unwind any small nut and bolt

Enjoy

latest_release.release_notes: Thank you robbet hesse for the help

data.title: Rotate

data.description:
Give a Hart if you like it!

Work Time Assistant helps you manage your work hours in a flextime environment
- notifies when your work day is over
- integrates with Timeline (beta)
- pauses on breaks
- tracks overtime and breaks
- work day count down

Twitter: @work_assistant

Instructions:
- Hit START when you come to work (you can do it later too)
- PAUSE on lunch
- STOP when work day is over
- Check/change overtime quota if you exchange for money

Remember to update the app from time to time.
If the application doesn't work after an update (very unlikely) try reinstalling and in the last resort reinstall Pebble App.

Let me know if you have any requests!

latest_release.release_notes: - Fixed timezones issue (thanks Alejo!)

data.title: Work Time Assistant

data.author: Cronian Labs

changelog.release_notes:
The latest version of the iOS companion app including all the features needed for the Pebble app is currently pending approval from Apple.

The current MakeFit app in the Apple AppStore is compatible with the Pebble app, but is not sending some of the information needed by the Pebble App for complete functionality.

data.description:
We believe there’s a lot more to sports tracking than just tracking your steps. MakeFit is a quantified fitness tracking app that helps you track fitness improvements and keep yourself fit over time.

Know how workouts and activities compare in effort, how your fitness evolves over time as a result of your efforts and if your current fatigue is increasing, decreasing or maintaining your fitness level.

MakeFit is the only mobile app that gives you a personal analysis of your sports and movement efforts using data from MotionTracking (Apple M7 & M8) and Bluetooth HR monitors. Also, with Pebble watch app you can now easily track live your workout activity.

The current version of MakeFit works on iPhone 5s or newer. We're working on an update to include support for older devices as well though HealthKit.

latest_release.release_notes:
The latest version of the iOS companion app including all the features needed for the Pebble app is currently pending approval from Apple.

The current MakeFit app in the Apple AppStore is compatible with the Pebble app, but is not sending some of the information needed by the Pebble App for complete functionality.

data.title: MakeFit

data.author: A D Tennant
data.description:
Chebble is Chatter for Pebble. 

Keep up with your Salesforce Chatter feed from your wrist.

Chebble is a free, open source app for checking your Salesforce Chatter feed on your Pebble Smartwatch.

Chebble allows you to view the last 10 posts from your Chatter feed, grouped by date. You can view the full details of any post, including files, links and polls.

Chebble uses OAuth to connect to Salesforce so that your login details are kept safe and secure.

You can follow Chebble on Twitter (@chebbleapp) for details of the latest releases and planned features.

Please visit the Settings page for the app before using it so that you can grant the app permission to access your Salesforce org.
data.title: Chebble

data.author: Steve Karmeinsky

changelog.release_notes: Add Chalk support
Wrong image file, now correct

Added the ability to go back if you've made a mistake. So UP button counts balls, DOWN button strikes, SELECT outs. If you've made a mistake, the BACK button (single press) will revert the system the the last state (so say it was 3 outs, when you meant to press a strike, then pressing the back button will take you back to 2 outs [and however many balls/strikes were active]).

Once 7 innings are played out, TIE? will be visible (where HOME/AWAY is) and pressing the SELECT button will allow the game to continue (so innings 8), this will continue as long as you press SELECT after the end of HOME innings (so the game can continue indefinitely).
Version 1

data.description:
A simple ump clicker for softball

UP increments balls
SELECT increments outs
DOWN increments strikes

If BACK is (single) pressed it will take you back to the last state (i.e. if 4 balls so a walk, will take back to 3) or if 3 outs (which changes innings) will take back to 2 outs.

After 7 innings it's possible to press SELECT when TIE? is displayed and then the game can continue.

latest_release.release_notes: Add Chalk support

data.title: Softball Ump Clicker

data.description:
A simple meditation timer.

Preparation time - relax and prepare mind for meditation

Meditation time - focus mind in breathing or in the entire body

Finalization time - slowly prepare mind to return to rotin

Version 1.1
--------------------

data.author: Ben Chapman-Kish

changelog.release_notes: This is not a content update, but rather an update adding colourful graphics and compatibility with the new Pebble Time!

Cold War Simulator 2K15, version 1.3 is here! This is the last update for content that was part of my original vision for this app. Two new options, based on less interaction between nations, but on your own nation. "Produce Nukes": Increase your power, but at what risk? "Push Research": Assemble a research team to develop new technologies, just make sure that none of your researchers are spies. The instructions screen is also improved, so that it's aesthetically better and it also shows automatically the first time the app is run. It can also now be closed with the select button. Enjoy what is probably the final content release!
Added turn counter, turn history, and options

Huzzah! You can now press down to repeat the last action committed, and there are now a few more possible outcomes for existing options as well. Some back-end stuff was done as well, to improve functionality and prepare for future updates. Up next: View the history of your actions committed and their outcomes.

data.description:
It's a number of years after the most recent global war and tensions are heating up between you and the other world superpower. The fate of the world is in your hands as you use strategy and wits to either defeat them by force or by persuading them to demilitarize. Fight proxy wars, send spies, make pleas to cut down on the nukes, and more in this thrilling new game. Now with colours for Pebble Time.

Disclaimer: This is a tongue-in-cheek satirical parody of both the cold war and of modern “simulator" games. The bad art style and trivial gameplay is intentional. Hope you enjoy it!

latest_release.release_notes: This is not a content update, but rather an update adding colourful graphics and compatibility with the new Pebble Time!

data.title: Cold War Simulator 2K15

data.description:
Use your activity tracker to notify you when a bluetooth disconnection occurs (you've left your phone behind).

If you don't already use an activity tracker, this app will run in the background and monitor your bluetooth connection status.  

Many watchfaces have this capability, but what if you don't have such an app loaded when you walk away from your phone?  This app ensures you're notified, regardless of the current screen.

data.description:
This watch app will easily allow you to find the closest & cheapest gas station to your current location.

Launch the app and it will start searching for the closest gas station - when found it will display the station name, distance & direction from your current location and regular, premium and diesel prices (if applicable).

It will then start to search for the cheapest gas station in a 10 mile radius - when found it will display the station name, distance & direction from your current location and regular, premium and diesel prices (if applicable).

All data retrieved from http://www.mygasfeed.com/

And more!

As always, thank you all for the support, if you have a question or bug find, don't hesitate to send me an email.

To access this, simply hold select on the main screen.

Coming up - configurablity - select which 3 locations you want!

As usual, don't hesitate to email me with questions or bug reports.

NOW IN VERSION 2.0!
NEW UPDATE INCLUDES

3Weather is an intuitive watchapp designed to give you technical weather details at your wrist. Designed with pilots in mind, this app includes temperature, pressure, wind, cloud, and a summary of them all. Weather at your wrist has never been so easy.

Note: This project is still a work in progress. Please don't hesitate to contact me via the support email below if you have found any bugs, glitches, or something that shouldn't happen. Also, until I have decreased memory usage, this app may be a little slow on the menu screen. Enjoy.

data.description:
BrewBuddy is an AeroPress timer for your wrist. Pick the recipe and let it handle the rest.

It comes with 20 recipes built-in, organized in three distinct categories:

- Standard (9 recipes)
- Two-cup (2 recipes)
- Championship (9 recipes)

Information about the in-app recipe description format
--------------------------------------------------------------
"120s, T, 4.5w, 1.5c, M-C" describes a recipe with 
- 120 seconds of total time
- Brewed in traditional method (not inverted!)
- Will need 4.5 shots of water (a shot is measured by the blue number markings on your AeroPress)
- Will need 1.5 scoops of coffee
- Grinded in medium coarse setting

--
The recipes in BrewBuddy and the whole idea is taken from the app AeroPress Timer for iOS (<3), make sure to check that out: http://aeropresstimer.com/

AeroPress is a registered trademark of Aerobie, Inc., Palo Alto, California, USA.

latest_release.release_notes: - Initial release

data.description: Track your PD and help research as you go The Fox Insight Wear app can be used only by Parkinson's patients participating in the Fox Insight trial. The Fox Insight Trial is an online clinical study to gather the world's largest collection of data about daily life with Parkinson's disease directly from people living with the disease. For more information about joining the trial please contact wear@foxinsight.org The Fox Insight Wear app collects data about various aspects of your movement. You can also directly report to the app (such as “I took medication”), to help interpret movement data and provide additional insights. The app can help you better understand your own patterns and trends. In addition, your data is transmitted anonymously to researchers who are developing methods for detecting and measuring PD motor symptoms for evaluation of new treatments, and increased understanding of disease progression.

latest_release.release_notes: Release 3.2

data.title: Fox Wearables Companion App

data.author: Rono

changelog.release_notes:
First release of Pebble app. Automatically launched when iPhone app is started. The three buttons are mapped to these behaviors:
- Up: get a photo from the phone camera and displays it on the watch
- Select: tell the phone to take a full res photo
- Down: toggle detection mode

data.description:
With the iPhone companion app, use your phone as a camera to watch for your baby (or anything else you want). Whenever a motion or a noise is detected by the phone, a screenshot is sent to the Pebble watch, with an optional vibe.

The night mode produces images clear enough to make you see what happens even in very low light conditions, ideal to check that your baby is sleeping peacefully.

You can request, from the watch, to get a preview by just pressing a button. You can also trigger the phone to take a full res photo.
 
The iOS companion application comes with additional features :
- live B&W preview of what *exactly* will be sent to the watch
- enable/disable night mode
- enable/disable buzz mode
- choose front or back camera
- select the noise threshold detection

latest_release.release_notes:
First release of Pebble app. Automatically launched when iPhone app is started. The three buttons are mapped to these behaviors:

data.description:
Loving the Simplicity Watchface? But constantly accidentally push buttons and the watch displays something else?

This Watchapp was inspired by the Simplicity (https://github.com/pebble/pebble-sdk-examples/tree/master/watchfaces/simplicity) Watchface and provides a sort of Keylock.

There are other apps like Button Lock (https://apps.getpebble.com/applications/543f02a145b1f75605000010) but i would rather have all time information on the screen instead of a lock.

Regarding the date, i like to have as much information at hand as possible, so i changed to format to "barebone", with full year, month and day.

If you like this app, you can Flattr it at https://flattr.com/submit/auto?user_id=x29a&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.getpebble.com%2Fapplications%2F54fad867c2eca30d2a000016

data.description:
Introducing the new pinnacle in practical Pebble parenting functionality!

Tired of your little ones disagreeing on how late is 'late' at bed time? Or arguing whether the displayed time of day has anything to do with getting out of bed?

Solve all disagreement and SHOW them what 'time' it is! This handy app enables Pebble parents to display common daily events - on demand - instead of the time of day: whether that be 'bed time', 'play time', 'bath time', 'lunch time' or many more. Now with enhanced readability for encouraging little readers!

v1.6: minor technical update.

Check out the link to 'more from this developer' below for the original 'bed time' watchface.

And a special thanks to Pebble Forum user LaFauve for helping me fix some of the code!

data.author: Sawyer Vaughan

changelog.release_notes: Now supports the Pebble 2!
Fix the text in the about page to Games for Pebble's proper name.

Removed chess and added solitaire to the original Pebbles. 
Added instructions for each game. 
Added a difficulty setting for chess. 
Fixed Solitaire bug. A user could add a card in the middle of the pile to the foundation at the top, which made the game unwinnable. 
Shows the Decrypt sequence after a win or a loss. 
Fixed numerous bugs in chess.
Support for Pebble Time Round. Have fun!

Solitaire is here! I hope you enjoy playing Solitaire on your Pebble Times.

I also fixed the win conditions for chess. The game will now handle it properly when you win.

A fix for improper naming of the app in last release. 

Enjoy Games for Pebble! Email me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with comments, suggestions, or bugs.

This release is mainly a cleanup of the UI in the app. The menu is all-new and redesigned. Icons in the blackjack game no longer appear in inverted colors or as black squares. Support for Pebble Time is complete and fine-tuned. 

Enjoy! Email me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with suggestions, bugs, or feedback.

Official color release. Pebble Time users can enjoy all of their favorite games in color! Pebble Time can also play Decrypt, a color code matching game!

In Decrypt, you are trying to decode the enemy's code. They have a code of six colors, and your goal is to guess what their code is. On each guess, the white dots will tell you how many colors you got right in the right space, and the black dots will tell you how many colors you have right, but in the wrong spot. 

Enjoy! Email sawyervaughan@gmail.com for comments, suggestions, or bugs.

2048 is here! Now you can combine numbers to your heart's desire! 

In anticipation of its coming release, Pebble Time users can now play Decrypt in PebbGames! I've also added color support for the rest of the games. 

This release also comes with many other bug fixes and improvements, such as:
 - Edited the size of chess to make it more easily viewable
 - Refactored tennis in order to have enough space for other games
 - Added support for Pebble Time. Added a win scenario for tennis
 - Increased high score available for food
 - Fixed a bug where Blackjack would not shuffle cards properly
 - Added a winning score to tennis, which fixed a bug where the score wouldn't display if it were ten or above

As always, enjoy! Email me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with questions, comments, bugs or suggestions.

Blackjack has been added! Have fun!

As always, contact me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with advice, bugs or otherwise.
Initial release of PebbGames! Initial games offering includes three games. Email me at sawyervaughan@gmail.com with game suggestions, bug discoveries, feedback and more. Have fun!

data.description: The best games app for Pebble, now in color with the Pebble Time! A collection of addicting games to waste a few minutes whenever you need to.

latest_release.release_notes: Now supports the Pebble 2!

data.title: Games for Pebble

data.author: David C. Drake

changelog.release_notes: Discontinued Aplite support due to issues arising from recent firmware updates (SDK 3.8).
Improved the location-generating algorithm and added version information to the intro text.

Added color and other SDK 3 updates, decreased base fatigue rate, adjusted how stats are affected by primary attributes, increased weapon and armor benefits, added a physical defense bonus to the effects of Pebble of Shadow infusions in clothing/armor, and improved overall code efficiency.
Fixed an issue causing some goblins to be drawn as knights.

data.description:
A 3D fantasy action-RPG! Explore dungeons, slay monsters, level up, and wield Pebbles of Power to cast spells or enchant your weapons and armor. How long will you last in the dark, cavernous depths of PebbleQuest?

UP: Press/hold to step forward. Press twice to turn left.
SELECT: Press to use your current weapon/spell.
DOWN: Press/hold to step back. Press twice to turn right.

latest_release.release_notes: Discontinued Aplite support due to issues arising from recent firmware updates (SDK 3.8).

data.title: PebbleQuest

data.description:
Watchapp for all fans of Formula 1.
In the application, there is a time counter to the nearest event, so you will not miss your favorite Grand Prix.
Also you can watch the position of your favorite driver and team in the overall ranking.
Now the season 2018!

All data displayed by Formula 1 is provided by the Ergast Motor Racing Developer API.

latest_release.release_notes: - New 2018 season 🏁

data.title: Formula 1

data.author: Brandon Berookhim
data.description: This app should be used as a companion while brushing one's teeth. Once started, the app gives the user three seconds to prepare. It then allots 10 seconds per area of the mouth, starting from the bottom right are and ending with the top left area. It displays what area is up next and it also lights up and vibrates as the next area approaches. It runs for 3 minutes and includes all areas of the mouth, including the tongue and cheeks.
data.title: Toothbrush Buddy

data.author: Mike Mallin

changelog.release_notes: Truncated output data to two decimal places.
Version 1.0 - Initial Release

data.description:
TekSavvy Usage will let you keep track of your current month's bandwidth usage (both on and off peak). This information is usually updated once per day.

Press the select button to refresh the data. You will need to configure your API key for this app to be useful. Follow the link in the configuration page if you do not know it already.

I am not affiliated in any way, shape or form with TekSavvy (beyond the fact they are my ISP). I found a use for this app, and they have OK'd it, so I'm publishing it for others to hopefully find useful as well.

latest_release.release_notes: Truncated output data to two decimal places.

data.title: TekSavvy Usage

data.description:
Research application aiming to automatically detect and log daily activities from motion sensors onboard the Pebble watch. 

Note: This application is simply a data logging application for now. Automatic activity and mood detection will be conducted offline. In return for your data logging efforts, we will provide a journal-like visualization of your data upon request.

latest_release.release_notes: -added graphic icons for labels

data.title: SmartDAYS

Check out your current downloads and your download history from SABnzbd.
This app is not official, and is not endoresed by SABnzbd.

Remember to set Server-URL and API-key in settings.
Server-URL should be in the following format: http://www.example.com:9095/

changelog.release_notes:
First Release!

Features:
- Use geolocation to find nearest BART station and display departure time
- Departure time updates every minute
- select current station to bring up station menu to select a different BART station for display

data.description:
BART on Time uses your geolocation to effortlessly find the nearest BART station and display the latest departure times in real-time.

Looking for a specific BART station? Just select the current station to bring up a stations menu for your selection.

NOTE: BART on Time requires your Pebble to be connected to your phone

latest_release.release_notes:
First Release!

Features:
- Use geolocation to find nearest BART station and display departure time
- Departure time updates every minute
- select current station to bring up station menu to select a different BART station for display

data.title: BART on Time
